datum: O all ye holy children of God, * be pleased to pray for our salvation and the salvation of all men.
V. Be glad in the Lord, and rejoice, ye righteous.
R. And shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
Be Thou, O Lord, the Shield of Thy people, * and cover with Thine everlasting Arm those who trust in the help of Thine Apostles Peter and Paul, and the others Thine Apostles.

We pray Thee, O Lord, that all Thine holy children may in all places succour us, and that as we call to mind their worthy acts, so we may feel the comfort of their friendship. * Grant Thou also peace in our days, and keep Thy Church ever clean purged of all iniquity. ** Order Thou also our footsteps, our deeds, and our wills, and the footsteps, the deeds, and the wills of all Thy servants, in the straight path that leadeth unto salvation in Thee. * Reward with eternal life all them who do us good. And grant eternal, rest unto all the faithful departed.
